text: Carl von Essen (18 October 1940 – 11 November 2021) was a Swedish fencer. He competed at the 1976 Summer Olympics in Montreal, where he won a gold medal in épée with the Swedish team. He was born in Jönköping, Sweden. Von Essen died in Björnlunda, Sweden on 11 November 2021, at the age of 81. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Olympic gold medalists for Sweden Category:Fencers Category:People from Jönköping
title: Carl von Essen
